channel.title: Projects on Kevin Zolea
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kevin Zolea

item.title: Analyzing the Diurnal Cycle of Precipitation in the NCEP Global Forecast System
item.description: My summer research project from my internship at the National Centers for Environmental Prediction

item.title: Case Study Analysis of Easterly Wave Formation in the East Pacific
item.description: My summer undergraduate research internship at Colorado State University in the Department of Atmospheric Science. Sponsored by the National Science Foundation.

item.title: NJ Air Quality Viewer
item.description: A shiny app to view NJ’s air quality data trends for criteria air pollutants from 1990-2018

item.title: US Census Bureau Shiny App
item.description: A simple shiny app that uses the tidycensus package to analyze some census data from the US Census Bureau API
